name: blump (AmpreHourPenguin)
description:
Controls:

Left: A-key or Left Arrow or Left Stick

Right: D-key or Right Arrow or Left Stick

Jump：Space or  A-button

Switch Blumps: Comma, Period, Slash or X-button, Y-button, B-button

I ran short on time the Indie Tales Game Jam so I'm posting what I've got.
